Token.Abstract: The PFLogInViewControllerDelegate protocol defines methods a delegate of a PFLogInViewController should implement. All methods of this protocol are optional.
Sent to the delegate to determine whether the log in request should be submitted to the server.

Parameter.Name: logInController
Parameter.Abstract: The login view controller that is requesting the data.

Parameter.Name: username
Parameter.Abstract: the username the user tries to log in with.

Parameter.Name: password
Parameter.Abstract: the password the user tries to log in with.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A BOOL indicating whether the log in should proceed.

Token.Abstract: Sent to the delegate when a PFUser is logged in.

Parameter.Name: logInController
Parameter.Abstract: The login view controller where login finished.

Parameter.Name: user
Parameter.Abstract: PFUser object that is a result of the login.

Token.Abstract: Sent to the delegate when the log in attempt fails.

Parameter.Name: logInController
Parameter.Abstract: The login view controller where login failed.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: NSError object representing the error that occured.

Token.Abstract: Sent to the delegate when the log in screen is cancelled.

Parameter.Name: logInController
Parameter.Abstract: The login view controller where login was cancelled.
